set (TARGET_NAME glslang)

set(GLSLANG_TESTS_DEFAULT OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(GLSLANG_ENABLE_INSTALL_DEFAULT OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(BUILD_EXTERNAL OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(ENABLE_OPT OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
add_subdirectory(${TARGET_NAME} EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)

set(3RDPARTY_INCLUDES 
	${3RDPARTY_INCLUDES}
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glslang/glslang/HLSL
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glslang/glslang/Include
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glslang/glslang/MachineIndependent
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glslang/glslang/Public
	PARENT_SCOPE)

set_property(DIRECTORY ${TARGET_NAME} PROPERTY FOLDER "3rdparty")
